## BaseConfig.baseURL property

basic url

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
baseURL?: string | URL;
```

## Remarks

if it isn't an absolute URL, it will be ignored. [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/URL/URL](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/URL/URL)
